product_name: ERGObaby Four Position Carrier Teething Pad and Bib
long_description: Specifically designed for the Four Position 360 Baby Carrier, this teething pad and bib protects your carrier and provides a safe teething pad for your baby while you enjoy the outdoors.
short_description: Specifically designed for the Four Position 360 Baby Carrier, this teething pad and bib protects your carrier and provides a safe teething pad for your baby while you enjoy the outdoors.
